block.p: OMNI NUTRACEUTICALS INC., Los Angeles, a maker of vitamin and nutritional products, hired Rabobank International to explore alternatives for Omni, including mergers, joint ventures and debt restructuring.

CALPINE CORP., San Jose, Calif., a developer of power plants, said it bought natural gas producing properties in Canada and the United States for about $206 million to fuel new power plants it is building.

OMNI NUTRACEUTICALS INC., Los Angeles, a maker of vitamin and nutritional products, hired Rabobank International to explore alternatives for Omni, including mergers, joint ventures and debt restructuring.

CALPINE CORP., San Jose, Calif., a developer of power plants, said it bought natural gas producing properties in Canada and the United States for about $206 million to fuel new power plants it is building.

RF MICRO DEVICES INC., Greensboro, N.C., which makes cellular phone chips, said it would split its stock two shares for one on Aug. 25 to shareholders of record on Aug. 8. This will be its third stock split in about 16 months.

USX-MARATHON GROUP, Houston, an oil company, said it planned to buy back as much as $450 million of its common stock. The sum would currently buy about 18.8 million shares, or 6 percent of the shares outstanding.
